cell.html: A handyman makes a play for a widow's millions in the town where America's robber barons built their castles and mansions.
cell.text: A handyman makes a play for a widow's millions in the town where America's robber barons built their castles and mansions.

cell.html: Perched between the US and Mexico, Brownsville's a town where the border is well marked, but the boundaries are as murky as the muddy Rio Grande. Like on the morning of March 3, 1993, when a woman set out to punish the young man who broke her daughter's heart, leaving the Texan town mired in Mexican black magic and murder.
cell.text: Perched between the US and Mexico, Brownsville's a town where the border is well marked, but the boundaries are as murky as the muddy Rio Grande. Like on the morning of March 3, 1993, when a woman set out to punish the young man who broke her daughter's heart, leaving the Texan town mired in Mexican black magic and murder.

cell.html: A prosperous New Jersey suburb with a large Jewish community is stunned when beloved rabbi Fred Neulander is implicated in his wife Carol's murder.
cell.text: A prosperous New Jersey suburb with a large Jewish community is stunned when beloved rabbi Fred Neulander is implicated in his wife Carol's murder.

cell.html: A friendly Texas town is stunned when one of its most popular citizens is accused of murdering a wealthy widower.
cell.text: A friendly Texas town is stunned when one of its most popular citizens is accused of murdering a wealthy widower.

cell.html: Dirk Greineder was a renowned physician and devoted family man--or so it seemed. Then one Halloween morning, his wife May was found dead, and the doctor found himself in a world of trouble. Investigators uncovered a secret life that this father of three kept hidden--and intended to keep secret, no matter the cost. Residents of the affluent Massachusetts suburb Wellesley were shocked when the well-respected allergist was accused of the brutal murder of his wife.
cell.text: Dirk Greineder was a renowned physician and devoted family man--or so it seemed. Then one Halloween morning, his wife May was found dead, and the doctor found himself in a world of trouble. Investigators uncovered a secret life that this father of three kept hidden--and intended to keep secret, no matter the cost. Residents of the affluent Massachusetts suburb Wellesley were shocked when the well-respected allergist was accused of the brutal murder of his wife.

cell.html: Anjette Lyles was a beloved Macon restaurateur, twice widowed, a mother--and almost the first white woman electrocuted in Georgia. In the 1950s, Macon was a sleepy little town, where doors remained unlocked and murder was rare. When Anjette Lyles was charged with poisoning two husbands, her mother-in-law, and 9-year-old daughter, Macon was thrust into national spotlight. And newspaper accounts spiced up the allegations with references to voodoo ceremonies and black magic.
cell.text: Anjette Lyles was a beloved Macon restaurateur, twice widowed, a mother--and almost the first white woman electrocuted in Georgia. In the 1950s, Macon was a sleepy little town, where doors remained unlocked and murder was rare. When Anjette Lyles was charged with poisoning two husbands, her mother-in-law, and 9-year-old daughter, Macon was thrust into national spotlight. And newspaper accounts spiced up the allegations with references to voodoo ceremonies and black magic.

cell.html: A Florida town, popular with retirees, is shocked when two of its senior citizens are found murdered. Leo Gleese and Hazel Stanley had both moved to Sebring after retiring and met at the church of another newcomer, Reverend John Canning, pastor at the Fountain of Life Church. Just days after he presided over the funeral of Hazel Gleese, Sebring police arrested Canning and charged him with the two murders.
cell.text: A Florida town, popular with retirees, is shocked when two of its senior citizens are found murdered. Leo Gleese and Hazel Stanley had both moved to Sebring after retiring and met at the church of another newcomer, Reverend John Canning, pastor at the Fountain of Life Church. Just days after he presided over the funeral of Hazel Gleese, Sebring police arrested Canning and charged him with the two murders.

cell.html: "The City Different"--Santa Fe. From movie stars to Native-American markets to opera, Santa Fe has become the archetypical arty city of the Southwest. But in 1992, when a Good Samaritan tried to help a woman in trouble, the city different would become the city deadly--and residents would be left to figure out whether a cop or a drug dealer was responsible for the killing of a popular pharmacist.
cell.text: "The City Different"--Santa Fe. From movie stars to Native-American markets to opera, Santa Fe has become the archetypical arty city of the Southwest. But in 1992, when a Good Samaritan tried to help a woman in trouble, the city different would become the city deadly--and residents would be left to figure out whether a cop or a drug dealer was responsible for the killing of a popular pharmacist.

cell.html: A hip, ultra chic part of Miami loses its reputation as a homosexual safe haven when fashion designer Gianni Versace is gunned down outside his home.
cell.text: A hip, ultra chic part of Miami loses its reputation as a homosexual safe haven when fashion designer Gianni Versace is gunned down outside his home.

cell.html: A patrician world of polo and politics, Potomac's a town where Washington high society lives in hunt-country hauteur. But in the summer of 1997, the wealthy D.C. suburb is stunned when Ruthann Aron, a former U.S. Senate candidate and real estate developer, is charged with conspiring to kill her husband and a lawyer who had hurt her political career.
cell.text: A patrician world of polo and politics, Potomac's a town where Washington high society lives in hunt-country hauteur. But in the summer of 1997, the wealthy D.C. suburb is stunned when Ruthann Aron, a former U.S. Senate candidate and real estate developer, is charged with conspiring to kill her husband and a lawyer who had hurt her political career.

cell.html: Ever since Lewis and Clark paddled past St. Louis, it's been the gateway to the west. Unfortunately for St. Louis, heading west in search of a better life was a hard habit to shake. By the 1990s, so many had fled to the suburbs that the old joke about the Gateway Arch being "a monument to the people who left town" wasn't so funny. But moving to the safe suburbs proved deadly for a housewife, while her husband was miles away on a "daddy's weekend" with the four kids.
cell.text: Ever since Lewis and Clark paddled past St. Louis, it's been the gateway to the west. Unfortunately for St. Louis, heading west in search of a better life was a hard habit to shake. By the 1990s, so many had fled to the suburbs that the old joke about the Gateway Arch being "a monument to the people who left town" wasn't so funny. But moving to the safe suburbs proved deadly for a housewife, while her husband was miles away on a "daddy's weekend" with the four kids.

cell.html: Life in the peaceful, all-American city of Elkhart, Indiana, gets turned upside down when a messy love triangle leads to the murder of a young wife.
cell.text: Life in the peaceful, all-American city of Elkhart, Indiana, gets turned upside down when a messy love triangle leads to the murder of a young wife.
